summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4762 for the improvement of West Thistle Street from 21st Avenue Southwest to 16th Avenue Southwest; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55062, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
